features: 🌈[ Traveling Essentials Must Haves ]:Travel size toiletries elastic sleeves are suitable for travel to protect liquid items. This travel gadgets fit for most travel containers in luggage, such as travel size toiletries, Cover shampoo bottles, conditioner, body wash, cosmetics, sunscreen and other liquid items to prevent leaks from soiling luggage during travel.Being a Travel essentials for women and man.

🌈[High Elastic Quality Material ]:This leak proof set of toiletries cover is made of high quality silicone material,which is highly elastic and can firmly wrap the toiletries, It is more elastic than other sleeve, which make sure it is not ripped even when long time using. Elastic and can be reused.Can be a Essentials for vacation,airplane travel, cruise.Don't worry about any leakage once you cover it on your bottle.

🌈[Size] Each travel leak-proof cover measures approximately 3 x 1.5 x 0.8 inches and can be Maximum Stretchable to 8.3 inch,It takes up less space in your bag or luggage, which meets the size of most toiletries and is easy to carry.

🌈[ Easy to install ] Put this Leak-proof sleeves over the shampoo, Stablely stays on toiletry containers,the silicone material can adsorb the bottle to avoid opening the leakage during the travel.Very suitable for family travel, have Sixteen colors for your choice.Total enough for you and your family for a short trip or long travel.

🌈[Widely used] You'll receive 8 pcs of colorful Silicone Toiletry Sleeves Leak Proof accessories, including 2 each in pink, black, white, and blue,These travel accessories for luggage are not only suitable for travel, but for around your home. keep your bottles from leaking on the go,Reverts back to original shape after each use.getting your satisfaction is our goal, if you have any quality problems, please feel free to contact us.

productInformation.value: #16,989 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #7 in Cosmetic Travel Cases

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These covers are a life saver and worth every penny. They were super easy to use, stayed tight on the travel bottles and most of all WORKED!!!! One of my bottles did open during my flight in my checked bag and the mess was contained in the silicone cover. I was able to rinse it out, dry it and reuse it! Where have these been all my life. Two of them did rip due to my manhandling but there were so many in this pack it was no big deal. I wish there were more colors instead of four.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work well - leak proof
reviews.reviewText: Work really well for travel. Have not had a product leak in our bags. I also use them to put around glass makeup bottles as a cushion to prevent them from breaking when dropped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They work at least once
reviews.reviewText: These kept the super leaky bottles from leaking but some broke when removing so make sure to bring extra with you for the return trip. Some were reusable others not so much so at least the pack came with a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Super impressed by these. Last year for a work conference I wanted to bring my self tanner and took every precaution I could think of - double zipper bagged it and then put it in a thick reusable grocery bag and when I got to my hotel I saw that the whole thing had exploded and ruined one of my favorite shirts. This year, I didn’t want to take any chances so I gave these a shot. Still took all precautions and used 2 sleeves on one bottle, used the plastic liner that the product came in and put it in a zippered bag. This made it through 4 flights without a single drop on anything outside of the sleeves. As you can see the top sleeve eventually tore, but the rest still held up and kept the lid tight and secure. I used it on all of my other liquid products and they all made it through effortlessly without damage to the sleeve or the product. These are my new travel go to. Couldn’t recommend them more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They concept is great and they worked ok until two of them ripped after 2 uses. Not the thickest of rubber. I even used the on a pretty small lotion bottle I carry in my purse and it still ripped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They fit good and you get a lot of them, can share with others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Finally, the days of using Ziploc’s twisted on are over! These are great reusable and fit any size bottle. I love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great on bottles 1.5+ diameter
reviews.reviewText: These are 1.4 in diameter, so they work best on 1.5 or wider bottles. I used these for my 3oz bottles. They are thicker and provide some cushion so the bottles do not knock each other/ For those bottles fit is tight, so no leaks possible. But for my 1-2oz bottles, I had to get thinner sleeves (search B0CGNTJM59 on Amazon). Too bad that return window for these ended since those thinner ones are stretchy enough and also work on the 3oz bottles.
